item.title: Chevrolet 1951 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 11, 2025

Chevrolet 1951 1.54 ETS2

The Chevrolet 1951 (1.54) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a classic American-style truck mod, inspired by the iconic Chevrolet Advance Design series from the early 1950s. With its retro chrome grille, rounded fenders, and vintage charm, it offers a nostalgic contrast to modern in-game trucks.

Credits: LAURO WAGNER

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: CAIO PADRON VITORIA 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 11, 2025

CAIO PADRON VITORIA 1.54 ETS2

The CAIO PADRON VITORIA (1.54) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a Brazilian intercity bus mod, replicating the real-world Caio Vitória coach model. Known for its durable chassis and distinctive boxy design, it offers a passenger transport experience rather than traditional cargo hauling.

Credits: LAURO WAGNER

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Volvo FH 2021 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 11, 2025

Volvo FH 2021 1.54 ETS2

The Volvo FH 2021 (1.54) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a modern, high-performance truck known for its power, efficiency, and advanced features. It offers a realistic driving experience with detailed interior and exterior designs, including customizable options. The truck is equipped with a range of powerful engines, improved aerodynamics, and cutting-edge safety systems, making it a popular choice for virtual truckers. The 1.54 update may include optimizations, bug fixes, or additional content for the vehicle. Ideal for long hauls and heavy cargo, the Volvo FH 2021 delivers both style and reliability in the game.

Credits: paolo santo

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Renault magnum 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 11, 2025

Renault magnum 1.54 ETS2

The Renault Magnum (1.54) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a classic, long-nosed truck known for its distinctive cab-over-engine design and retro-futuristic style. Introduced as a premium heavy-duty vehicle, it offers a spacious, comfortable interior with a unique dashboard layout. Though older than newer trucks in the game, it remains a favorite for its iconic look and solid performance.

The 1.54 update may include minor optimizations or bug fixes for the model. While not the most modern in terms of fuel efficiency or technology, the Renault Magnum stands out for its nostalgic charm and strong engine options, making it a great choice for players who appreciate vintage-style trucks.

Credits: paolo gomes

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: SCANIA NTG 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 11, 2025

SCANIA NTG 1.54 ETS2

The SCANIA Next Generation (NTG) 1.54 in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a modern, high-end truck series known for its power, efficiency, and premium design. Featuring a sleek, aerodynamic exterior and a highly detailed, ergonomic interior, it offers a realistic and comfortable driving experience.

The 1.54 update ensures compatibility and may include minor refinements. The SCANIA NTG comes with a range of powerful engines (up to 770 hp), advanced safety features, and extensive customization options—from chassis configurations to interior trim. Ideal for long hauls and heavy cargo, it remains one of the most popular trucks in ETS2 for its performance and style.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
